properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1 v6 c1 v7 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Parama pavitra swargapitha Jai prabhu Jai prabhu sarva sadaa yugayugamulaku Rakshakudaa mammulanu rakshinchitivi Jeevunda prabhu paapularakshakaa jai prabhu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Premaroopi neeve nannu preminchitivi Shramalanu ponditivi nee prema moolamuna{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Pranamidi siluvan nannu rakshinchitivi Paapamu theesitivi nee krupa unnathamu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Shakhtigala vaadaa chaavun gelchitivi Shakhtitho lechitivi thandritho kalipitivi{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}premagala prabhuvaa marala vachedavu Shramalanu tholiginchi nannu cherchukonduvu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Pravaahamulona prabhu nenundinanu Ninnu batti ne kshemamugaa nundu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Jai Jai yani paadudi yesunake mahima Jai Jai Halleluyaa Jai Jai Halleluyaa{/lang-eng}
